text: The Mercers' Arms, 2016 The Mercers' Arms was a pub at 17 Mercer Street, in London's Covent Garden, at the corner with Shelton Street. It closed as a pub in about 1973, and is now a private dining club. The earliest recorded landlord is a Robert Abraham in 1792, and the 1797 insurance document for the then landlord, Alexander Ogston, is held in the National Archives. ==References== Category:Covent Garden Category:Former pubs in London Category:Pubs in the City of Westminster
title: Mercers Arms, Covent Garden
